title: Couple With Heart: Person, Man, Medium Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple, specifically a person and a man, with a heart symbol indicating love or affection. The medium skin tone is specified for the man.

The subtle 3D shading on the individuals and the glowing heart on Apple devices conveys deep affection and a strong bond, making it perfect for expressing love and partnership.
